page.title: 11FOREST FARM
page.content: {Forest Farm}is a dairy farm about two miles South East of{Chippenham,}and its land covers about 160 acres. The farm buildings are sixty-seven years old and are in the centre of the land. There aren't any streams on the land and there isn't any woodland.The only crops grown are those to feed the cattle.The rest of the land is given over to grass. There are 75 dairy cows,55 young cattle and 2 bulls.The cows are milked twice a day,early morning and mid-afternoon, and the milk produced goes to{Wootten Bassett}a small town about four miles south of Swindon,by milk tanker.
